attributes.comment:
We do NOT support raising these fees. The process for adoption is front loaded
with costs which does impact individuals going through the process and will begin
to tip the scales to less diverse individuals being able to support adoption overall.
It is especially important where the processing time for the first time for
fingerprints and the I171H may take longer than the document is valid for which
then would present a second dose of the proposed increased fees to be paid. This
is unacceptable. What benefits are being supported regarding these increased
fees? That is the question we all must ask here.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Keith A. Dalton
